alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 1:58PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and central DeKalb Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sylvania, or near Rainsville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Fort Payne, Rainsville, Henagar, Sylvania, Fyffe, Powell, Section, Pisgah, and Valley Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
